long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Telviva One is a general-use cloud omnichannel tool managing audio, web chat, video conferencing, and text channels into a single pane of glass, enabling work from everywhere. It enables better quality conversations through context-driven cloud Unified Communications as a Service and gives users a feature rich, robust, reliable and secure business phone functionality. This plugin augments the Telviva One service, augmenting the web phone component independently in Chrome for a seamless user experience to make and receive calls and click-to-dial functionality. This plugin is available for existing Telviva users. Visit www.telviva.co.za for more information and to activate your Telviva service.
